original_text: Also he made before the house two pillars of thirty and five cubits high, and the chapiter that was on the top of each of them was five cubits.
korean_text: 성전 앞에 기둥 둘을 만들었으니 높이가 삼십오 규빗이요 각 기둥 꼭대기의 머리가 다섯 규빗이라

sentences.original_text: Also he made before the house two pillars
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 또한 성전 앞에 두 기둥을 만들었으니

sentences.original_text: of thirty and five cubits high
and the chapiter that was on the top of each of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 기둥 꼭대기에 있는 기둥머리는
